name: V-Racer Hoverbike
description: V-RACER HOVERBIKE is a fast-paced futuristic racing game in VR (HTC VIVE, OCULUS RIFT and Windows Mixed Reality).
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2000 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Core i7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2000 MB available space
